name: Spirits' Last Stand
description:
On your vacation to a nearby planet, you, Professor Rookson, accidentally angered a large group of spirits.

Unfortunately this means you'll have to end you vacation early and make a daring escape through an asteroid field.

Controls:

Press W to move your ship up and S to move it down.

Press Enter to select options.
